admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Highway Project for Yemen is
            designed to: (i) assist the Government in a selective
            strengthening program of the main road network through an
            asphaltic overlay of the Taiz-Al Mafraq road and restoration
            of its drainage and stormwater protection facilities; and
            (ii) provide technical assistance to the newly established
            Department of Transport in the Ministry of Communications
            and Transport. The project will benefit the producers and
            consumers of the Taiz and Ibb Governorates through savings
            in vehicle operating costs, and the Yemen Government by
            limiting increases in road maintenance and repair costs.
